    public class DpDataset
extends java.util.ArrayList<DpData>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Is an ArrayList of DpData (single measurements). FIXME Implement some Hashlist for performance optimization during searches in the DpDataset FIXME Research of overhead code (getDataBefore(), etc. ) is transfered over the wire (client - server) each time? If so, create static helper Class.
    Author:
    robert.zach@tuwien.ac.at
